game.name: Trivia Vault Football Trivia
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Football Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Football trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Football Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Football trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

reviewHighlights.text: Trivia Vault Football Trivia is a compact, fast-paced quiz game that follows the recognizable formula of Ripknot Systems’ long-running “Trivia Vault”...
